metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.code_html:
class Animal { // Superclass (parent)
  public void animalSound() {
    System.out.println("The animal makes a sound");
  }
}

class Dog extends Animal { // Subclass (child)
  public void animalSound() {
    super.animalSound(); // Call the superclass method
    System.out.println("The dog says: bow wow");
  }
}

public class Main {
  public static void main(String args[]) {
    Animal myDog = new Dog(); // Create a Dog object
    myDog.animalSound(); // Call the method on the Dog object
  }
}

content.text: The super keyword refers to superclass (parent) objects.
It is used to call superclass methods, and to access the superclass constructor.
content.html: It is used to call superclass methods, and to access the superclass constructor.

content.text: The most common use of the super keyword is to eliminate the confusion between superclasses and subclasses that have methods with the same name.
content.html: The most common use of the super keyword is to eliminate the confusion between superclasses and subclasses that have methods with the same name.

content.text: To understand the super keyword, you should have a basic understanding of Inheritance and Polymorphism .
content.html: To understand the super keyword, you should have a basic understanding of Inheritance and Polymorphism.

content.text: Read more about inheritance (subclasses and superclasses) in our Java Inheritance Tutorial .
content.html: Read more about inheritance (subclasses and superclasses) in our Java Inheritance Tutorial.

content.text: Read more about polymorphism in our Java Polymorphism Tutorial .
content.html: Read more about polymorphism in our Java Polymorphism Tutorial.
